name: FLENZERS CASTLE for HERETIC v1.0
description: FLENZERS CASTLE is not a place for the weak and feeble. Do not come here to play! Come to fight and to prove yourself! Flenzers burg will test your skills in combat. Learn the art of escape when your luck runs a-FOWL. The duct work can save you. Read your map and discover your advantages. This is for sky soldiers as well as the ground pounders.
